description: If you're struggling to write your first novel, or have a few under your belt and want to crank them out faster, this course is for you! Learn how to boost your word counts and get rid of all those fears you have of writing that's bubbling under the surface of your mind. Learn from someone with years of experience, whose fought and overcome these common internal battles that most fiction authors face.
title: Writing Productivity: Release Fears to Write Great Fiction
